workflows.name: Publish docs in the Wiki
workflows.display_title: Add Linux version suffix to Taskcluster (#5607)

head_commit.message:
Add Linux version suffix to Taskcluster (#5607)

* Move source generation into its own task
* Make scripts/linux/source.sh produce dist-agnostic packages
* Repack for target dist in build task
* Add repacked DSC file to build artifacts
* Append extra suffixes to the build package version
* Set the PR number for build tasks
* Move version suffixing into the source task
* Change suffix for `main` branch to ~build
* Update PPA automation workflow
* Use task owner in place of vpn@mozilla.com for changelog
